screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pws file in Corel Painter 2023
screenshot.caption: PWS file open in Corel Painter 2023

description: Painter allows you to create digital artwork and edit photos. The software provides various tools, including brush styles, gradients, surface textures, and weaves.

To customize layouts and preserve them for different needs, such as illustrating artwork or altering digital photographs, Painter allows you to save your workspace as a PWS file. For example, to save a workspace, select Window → Workspace → Export Workspace .

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pws file in Corel Painter 2023
images.caption: PWS file open in Corel Painter 2023
